# shared

**Type Property**

Returns the application instance, creating it if it doesn’t exist yet.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class var shared: NSApplication { get }
```

## Return Value

The shared application object.

## Discussion

This method also makes a connection to the window server and completes other initialization. Your program should invoke this method as one of the first statements in `main()`; this invoking is done for you if you create your application with Xcode. To retrieve the `NSApplication` instance after it has been created, use the global variable [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApp] or invoke this method.

## Related Documentation

- **Mac App Programming Guide**
- **run()**: Starts the main event loop.
- **terminate(_:)**: Terminates the receiver.

## Getting the shared app object

- **NSApp**: The global variable for the shared app instance.
